taxon_name.authority: (Willdenow) O. E. Schulz in I. Urban
(Willdenow) O. E. Schulz in I. Urban

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family brassicaceae;tribe brassiceae;genus cakile;species lanceolata;species lanceolata;subspecies pseudoconstricta

bio:treatment.description: Plants sprawling. Leaves: blade margins deeply pinnatifid. Fruits (slenderly) lanceoloid, 15â€“24 mm, constricted at articulation, (weakly 4-angled or terete); terminal segment less than 2 times length of proximal, apex acute.
bio:treatment.discussion: Subspecies lanceolata in Texas and Mexico are suspected to be introduced from ballast and naturalized locally, sometimes occurring with Cakile geniculata.
